      public String getUrl()
      Gets the URL used for connecting to the H2 database. This method is marked with @VisibleForTesting to make it accessible for testing purposes within the same package.
      Returns:
      The URL for connecting to the H2 database.

    • createDatabaseMetrics

      public void createDatabaseMetrics()
      Method: createDatabase() creates tables in the H2 database. Creation of 4 tables: 1) Metrics (ID, Date, Command, State, Means) 2) Container(ID,C_ID, C_NAME, Status, Image_ID, Network_ID, Gateway, IP_Address, Mac_Address) 3) Image (ID,NAME)
